channel.title: SQL on 茄子的养殖场
channel.description: Recent content in SQL on 茄子的养殖场

item.title: 刷题1
item.description: 182. 查找重复的电子邮箱 select `Email` from ( select `Email`, count(`Email`) as a from `Person` group by `Email` ) as temp where a > 1; 一些不熟悉的语句 like 模糊查询 select * from employees where last_name like '%a%'; group by（常常和聚合函数一起使用） 聚合
